title: "Artificial intelligence techniques used to obtain antibiotic resistance patterns"
excerpt: "The Universidad Carlos III de Madrid (UC3M) is conducting research that analyzes antibiotic resistance patterns with the aim of finding trends that can help decide which treatment to apply to each type of patient and stop the spread of bacteria."
